code: export var addAppointment=function addAppointment(newAppointment){return{type:"ADD_APPOINTMENT",payload:newAppointment};};export var editAppointment=function editAppointment(index,updatedAppointment){return{type:"EDIT_APPOINTMENT",payload:{index:index,updatedAppointment:updatedAppointment}};};export var editIndex=function editIndex(index){return{type:"EDIT_INDEX",payload:{index:index}};};export var deleteAppointment=function deleteAppointment(index){return{type:"DELETE_APPOINTMENT",payload:index};};
